category.name: Global Services.Options
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_gms_server_ca_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the file that stores the trusted certificates of the Certificate Authorities (CAs) for servers including Global Services server. This file should be in PEM format. This preference is applicable only when the Global Services is deployed in HTTPS mode. The value of this preference can be left blank if server certificate validation is not required.
